p: The in vitro system of V. officinalis established by us can be proposed as a rich source of phenylpropanoid glycosides, in particular verbascoside. The concentrations of this glycoside obtained are of practical interest, and what is most important, the highest amount was produced in bioreactor cultures (STB bioreactorâ€”9.17 g/100 g DW) ( Table 1).
